statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_logs WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT message FROM satellite_communication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, satellite_id, timestamp FROM satellite_communication_logs WHERE satellite_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_logs WHERE message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM satellite_communication_logs;
SELECT * FROM satellite_communication_logs WHERE satellite_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, satellite_id, message FROM satellite_communication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT satellite_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM satellite_communication_logs GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING total_logs > 10 ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM satellite_communication_logs WHERE message LIKE '%error%' GROUP BY satellite_id;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM satellite_communication_logs ORDER BY log_id ASC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_logs;
SELECT log_id, satellite_id, timestamp FROM satellite_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message FROM satellite_logs WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT status_id, status FROM satellite_status WHERE last_check BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT satellite_id, COUNT(status_id) FROM satellite_status GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING COUNT(status_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM satellite_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT satellite_id, COUNT(*) FROM satellite_logs GROUP BY satellite_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT status, COUNT(*) FROM satellite_status GROUP BY status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT satellite_id, AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM now() - timestamp)) AS uptime FROM satellite_logs GROUP BY satellite_id ORDER BY uptime DESC
SELECT * FROM satellite_logs sl JOIN satellite_status ss ON sl.satellite_id = ss.satellite_id
SELECT * FROM satellites ORDER BY satellite_name DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, log_time, message FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT issue_description, resolution FROM troubleshooting_issues WHERE issue_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, log_time, message FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM troubleshooting_issues WHERE issue_id = 3;
SELECT satellite_id, message FROM communication_logs WHERE log_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellites WHERE orbit_altitude_km > 1000;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT error_type, error_description FROM communication_errors WHERE error_type='Connection Issue';
SELECT note_text, engineer_name FROM troubleshooting_notes WHERE engineer_name='Alice' ORDER BY note_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM satellites ORDER BY launch_date DESC, satellite_name
SELECT satellite_name, orbit_altitude_km FROM satellites WHERE orbit_altitude_km > 200
SELECT s.satellite_name, l.timestamp, l.communication_status FROM satellites s JOIN communication_logs l ON s.satellite_id = l.satellite_id WHERE l.communication_status = 'Successful'
SELECT s.satellite_name, n.note_text, n.engineer_name FROM satellites s JOIN communication_logs l ON s.satellite_id = l.satellite_id JOIN troubleshooting_notes n ON l.log_id = n.log_id

SELECT s.satellite_name, l.timestamp, e.error_type, e.error_description FROM satellites s JOIN communication_logs l ON s.satellite_id = l.satellite_id JOIN communication_errors e ON l.log_id = e.log_id
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT name, location FROM satellites WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, last_communication FROM satellites WHERE last_communication > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT e.error_type, e.description, t.name AS technician_name FROM errors e JOIN technicians t ON e.error_id = t.technician_id;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT id, name, location FROM satellites WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, last_communication FROM satellites ORDER BY last_communication DESC;
SELECT communication_logs.log_id, satellites.name, communication_logs.message FROM satellites JOIN communication_logs ON satellites.id = communication_logs.satellite_id;
SELECT errors.error_type, errors.description, technicians.name FROM errors JOIN technicians ON errors.log_id = technicians.technician_id;
